a-de-e ša₂ {1}aš-šur-PAB-AŠ MAN KUR-aš-šur{KI} DUMU {1}{d}30-PAB-MEŠ-SU MAN KUR-aš-šur{KI}-ma TA@v {1}ba-a-lu MAN {KUR}ṣur-ri TA@v {1}x+x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x TA@v {KUR}ṣur-ri gab-bi-šu₂ TUR x x x x x x la x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x šum₂-ma la x+x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x šum₂-ma KUR-aš-šur x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x na-ṣa-ku-nu ma-a x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x ha x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x a-na pi-i x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x-MEŠ-šu₂-nu {1}aš-šur-PAB-AŠ MAN KUR-aš-šur{KI} x x x x x x x x x x x x {KUR}ṣur-ri ina UGU-hi la x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x an-nu-te URU-MEŠ an-nu-te ša₂ ah-pu-ni x x x x x x x x x x x x x+x il-la-ku-u-ni-ni la ta-šap-par la tu-še-ba-la-šu₂-nu x x {LU₂}qe-e-pu ša₂ ina UGU-hi-ka aš₂-kun-u-ni me-me-ni ina na-x+x x x x x x x x x x x x-ka {LU}par-ša₂-mu-te ša₂ KUR-ka ina mil-ki x x x x x x x x x x x-u-ni {LU₂}qe-e-pu is-si-šu₂-nu i-x x x x x x x x x x x x x+x x ša₂ {GIŠ}MA₂-MEŠ x+x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x ša₂ x x x x aš x+x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x ša₂ ina IGI-ka ta-lak-an-ni la x x x x x x x x x ša₂ pi-i-šu₂ la ta-ša₂-me šum₂-ma ba-la-at {LU₂}qe-e-bi x x x x u₃ e-gir₂-tu₂ ša a-šap-par-kan-ni ba-la-at {LU₂}qe-e-bi la ta-pat-ti o šum₂-ma {LU₂}qe-e-pu la qur-bu ina IGI-šu₂ ta-da-gal ta-pat-ti u₂-la-a {LU₂}A-KIN {LU₂}A-KIN x šum₂-ma {GIŠ}MA₂ ša₂ {1}ba-a-lu lu ša₂ UN-MEŠ {KUR}ṣur-ri ša₂ ina {KUR}pi-lis-ti lu ta-hu-me ša KUR-aš-šur{KI} gab-bu ta-mah-ha-ṣu-u-ni am-mar ša₂ ina ŠA₃ {GIŠ}MA₂-ni ša₂ {1}aš-šur-PAB-AŠ MAN KUR-aš-šur{KI} u₃ UN-MEŠ am-mar ša₂ ina ŠA₃ {GIŠ}MA₂ ina ŠA₃-šu₂-nu la i-ha-ṭi-u ina KUR-šu₂-nu u₂-sa-hu-ru an-nu-te KAR-MEŠ KASKAL-MEŠ ša₂ {1}aš-šur-PAB-AŠ MAN KUR-aš-šur a-na {1}ba-a-lu ARAD-šu₂ ip-qi-du-ni a-na {URU}a-ku-u {URU}du-uʾ-ri ina na-gi-e {KUR}pi-lis-te gab-bu o u₃ ina URU-MEŠ ta-hu-me ša₂ KUR-aš-šur{KI} ša₂ ši-di tam-tim gab-bu o u₃ ina {URU}gu-ub-lu {KUR}lab-na-na URU-MEŠ ša₂ ina KUR-i gab-bu o am-mar URU-MEŠ ša₂ {1}aš-šur-PAB-AŠ MAN KUR-aš-šur {1}ba-a-lu URU-MEŠ x x {KUR}ṣur-ra-a.a pit-ti ša₂ {1}aš-šur-PAB-AŠ MAN KUR-aš-šur{KI} i-din-aš₂-šu₂-ni ina ŠA₃ {GIŠ}MA₂-MEŠ-šu₂-nu u₃ am-mar e-rab-u-ni ina ŠA₃ URU-MEŠ ša₂ {1}x x x URU-MEŠ-šu₂ {URU}ŠE-MEŠ-šu₂ KAR-MEŠ-šu₂ ša a-na na-še-e x x x x x x x am-mar a-hi-ta-te-šu₂-nu-u-ni ki-i ša₂ ina la-bi-ri x x x x x x x in-na-ga-ru-u-ni me-me-ni pi-ir-ku x x x x x x x x ina ŠA₃ {GIŠ}MA₂-MEŠ-šu₂-nu la i-ha-ṭi ina ŠA₃ {KUR}x x x x x x x x x ina na-gi-šu₂ {URU}ŠE-MEŠ-šu₂ e-rim-tu₂ x x x x x x x x x x ki-i ša₂ la-bi-ri {KUR}ṣi-du-na-a.a x x x x x x x x x x {d}NIN.LIL₂ a-ši-bat {URU}NINA{KI} GIR₂.AN.BAR ha-an-ṭu it-ti-ku-nu li-ir-ku-su {d}IŠ.TAR a-ši-bat {URU}arba-il₃ re-e-mu gim-lu lu la i-ša₂-kan UGU-ku-un {d}gu-la a-zu-gal-la-tu₂ GAL-tu₂ GIG ta-ne₂-hu ina ŠA₃-bi-ku-nu si-im-mu la-zu ina zu-mur-ku-nu liš-kun da-a-mu u šar-ku ki-ma A-MEŠ ru-un-ka {d}si-bit-te DINGIR-MEŠ qar-du-te ina {GIŠ}TUKUL-MEŠ-šu₂-nu ez-zu-ti na-aš₂-pan-ta-ku-nu liš-kun {d}ba-a.a-ti-DINGIR-MEŠ {d}a-na-ti-ba-a.a-ti-DINGIR-MEŠ ina ŠU.2 UR.MAH a-ki-li lim-nu-u-ku-nu DINGIR-MEŠ GAL-MEŠ ša₂ AN-e u₃ KI.TIM DINGIR-MEŠ KUR-aš-šur{KI} DINGIR-MEŠ KUR-URI{KI} DINGIR-MEŠ e-bir-ID₂ ar-rat la nap-šu₂-ri li-ru-ru-ku-nu {d}ba-al-sa-me-me {d}ba-al-ma-la-ge-e {d}ba-al-ṣa-pu-nu TU₁₅ lem-nu ina {GIŠ}MA₂-MEŠ-ku-nu lu-šat-ba {GIŠ}mar-kas-ši-na lip-ṭu-ur {GIŠ}ṭar-kul-la-ši-na li-is-su-hu e-du-u dan-nu ina tam-tim li-ṭa-bi-ši-na šam-ru a-gu-u e-li-ku-nu li-li-a {d}mi-il-qar-tu {d}ia-su-mu-nu KUR-ku-nu a-na ha-pe-e UN-MEŠ-ku-nu a-na ša₂-la-li li-di-nu TA@v KUR-ku-nu lis-su-hu-ku-nu ŠUKU-MEŠ ina pi-i-ku-nu ku-zip-pi ina la-ni-ku-nu o I₃-MEŠ ina pa-ša₂-ši-ku-nu lu-hal-li-qu o {d}as-tar-tu₂ ina ta-ha-zi dan-ni {GIŠ}BAN-ku-nu li-iš-bir ina šap-la {LU₂}KUR₂-ku-nu li-še-ši-ib-ku-nu {LU₂}KUR₂ a-hu-u li-za-i-za mim-mu-ku-nu ṭup-pi a-de-e kun-nu ša₂ {1}ba-a-lu {KUR}ṣur-ra-a.a ina x x x
